price: 8. dan comida al pobre, al huérfano y al cautivo, a pesar de desearla para ellos mismos,
arabic: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wayuṭ'ʿimūna al-ṭaʿāma ʿalā ḥubbihi mis'kīnan wayatīman wa-asīran
